reviewText: Got a bit slow and sad....

I just couldn't get in to this gab fest. I like movies with at least a little action. I advise you to not take my rating seriously on this because I only watched maybe the first 15 minutes and then said nope no more.
Not  a great or even potentially a great move but it serves it's purpose - enertanment. A simplist story of a woman torn between her job and ethics.

There is a hidden gem stuck in the middle of this film -a musical number called You Bring Out the Beast in Me.
I oughta know, I composed it. I must confess the surrounding material isn't quite up to snuff,
but Larry Luckinbill's performance is a delight.

John Meyer, NYC
